name: Yamazaki Zipper Archive
summary: Learn about .YZ1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Satoshi Yamazaki developed the YZ1 archive format. It was the default format in which the Yamazaki ZIPPER and Deep Freezer utilities (now discontinued Windows applications) compressed files, often text documents.
Since many compression utilities no longer support the format, the format is obscure. However, you may still encounter an old YZ1 archive on your computer or receive one from another Windows user.

description: A YZ1 file is an archive saved in the Yamazaki Zipper (YZ1) format, which is supported by several compression utilities, including Yamazaki Deep Freezer. The YZ1 format is similar to .LZH and .ZIP compression methods and supports password-protection.

instructions: You can open YZ1 files with various compression utilities in Windows, including IZArc, TUGZip, and ZipGenius.
Various compression utilities, such as ZipGenius and IZArc, can convert YZ1 files to other formats.
For example, ZipGenius can extract files from YZ1 archives, then compress them in other formats, including the following types:
